ygData.subject: Re: Will not sufficient??
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oops, it must be late. I forgot one of my arguments. Let s assume that you are correct and a level 20 can do 100 damage. Now, tell me, what is good about a
ygData.messageBody:
>I am not sure of the damage multipliers over 20, but I know that a level 20
>warrior with the executioners axe can do 100 damage, 4x(damage multiplier
>for level 20) 25(base damage of axe)

Oops, it must be late. I forgot one of my arguments. Let's assume that you
are correct and a level 20 can do 100 damage. Now, tell me, what is good
about a Harm Touch that does 201 damage at that level? If the level 20 can
do 100 damage, the monster must have well over 2000 hit points, how can our
HT be a turning point attack?
